What is the disappointment of a businessman when Nastya, in the struggle for independence and in defiance of her father, chooses his peer and business partner.
But with a potential slogan for the audience of the film, the author got "into the nine": "Do not look for a problem where there is none." You can't say more precisely.
Their similarity simply cannot fail to amaze.
In both tapes, there are detachments of tough guys, soldiers of fortune, forced to take revenge on those who framed them, and in each company there is one beautiful girl.

The characters jump to almost the same parts of the world (both films begin in Latin America and end in the port of Los Angeles) and exploit the same spectacular shots - and here and there something full of dollar bills explodes, and a whirlwind of bucks descends on the scenery.
Even villains dressed in expensive costumes are not easy to distinguish from each other (they are played in both cases by Patricks - Jason Patrick here, Patrick Wilson there).
Zoe Saldana's previous role was Neytiri in Avatar.
Sylvain White used to shoot about dance battles - "The Brotherhood of Dance".
Chris Evans was recently invited to play the hero of other comics: he will be Captain America.
Director Sylvain White was inspired by a comic book series that came out in the 70s and was relaunched in the 2000s, Joe Carnahan was inspired by a comedy series of the 80s.

It's just amazing how they, without saying a word, brought different material to an absolutely identical rumbling denominator, making rather heavy, predictable, unnecessary action movies that evoke a lot of pictures with Willis and Schwarzenegger (comparisons invariably turn out to be in favor of Bruce and Arnold).
If we have to choose between these two tapes, then "Losers" look a little prettier and clearly more victorious in terms of efficiency (after all, the budget is three and a half times less).
At least there's Zoe Saldana, who is very fond of the bazooka
CAST: Jeffrey Dean Morgan, Zoe Saldana, Chris Evans, Patrick Wilson, Idris Elba, Columbus Short

PLOT: During an operation in the Bolivian jungle, a group of seasoned commandos working for the CIA were framed by their own superiors: a helicopter with children they were trying to save was blown up, and the soldiers themselves were considered dead from that second.
But they are alive - and intend at all costs to take revenge on the scoundrel with the languid voice that set it all up.
It's all cute, but honestly, it's worth spending an hour and a half of your life on White's painting only if you don't have any more interesting options at all.

A Romanian low-budget film that won a prize at a prestigious international film festival.

Without a doubt, the movie promises to be acutely social.
Of course, it will be realistic, and tough.
There is a high probability of participation of non-professional actors.
There will also be a lot of Romanian poverty in the film (yes, poverty does not know nationality, but Romanian, as our festival laureates prove from film to film, is especially poor).

Also, without knowing the year of release, you can easily take what is happening on the screen for the exercises of some underground critical realists from the Warsaw Pact countries, who were lectured on Bresson in the early 80s
The film won the Grand Prix of the Jury at the Berlin IFF.
The script is based on the play by Andreea Valean, whose work is in great demand among the directors of the Romanian "new wave".
Cinematographer Marius Panduru often works with Corneliu Porumboiu.

convert into an exploration a la the 70s, with a cowboy who decided to take a walk from the prison, from where he will soon leave, to the nearest saloon).

The heroes jump almost the same parts of the world ( both films begin in Latin America and end in the port of Los Angeles) and exploit the same spectacular shots - and here and there something full of dollar bills explodes, and a whirlwind of bucks descends on the scenery from bucks to the bucket descends on the scenery.
Even the villains dressed up in expensive costumes are not easy to distinguish from each other ( they are both played by the Patricks - Jason Patrick here, Patrick Wilson there) .
Zoe Saldana's previous role was Neytiri in Avatar.
Sylvain White used to shoot about dance battles - "The Brotherhood of Dance" - the Brotherhood of Dance.
Chris Evans was recently called to play a character from other comics: he will be Captain America.
Director Sylvain White was inspired by a comic book series that came out in the 70s and was relaunched in the 2000s, Joe Carnahan - a comedy series from the 80s.

It's just amazing how they, without collusion, brought different material to an absolutely identical rumbling denominator, making rather heavy, predictable, unnecessary action movies that evoke a lot of pictures with Willis and Schwarzenegger ( comparisons invariably turn out in favor of Bruce and Arnold) .
If we have to choose between these two tapes, then "Losers" look a little prettier and obviously more victorious in terms of efficiency ( after all, the budget is three and a half times less)
At least there is Zoe Saldana, who is very good with the Baskas.
CAST Jeffrey Dean Morgan, Zoe Saldana, Chris Evans, Patrick Wilson, Grace Elba, Columbus Short, Columbus Short.

PLOT: During an operation in the Bolivian jungle, a group of seasoned commandos working for the CIA were set up by their own superiors: a helicopter with the children they were trying to save was blown up, and the soldiers themselves were considered dead from that second onwards.
But they are alive - and intend to take revenge at all costs on the scoundrel with the languid voice who set it all up.
It's all nice, but honestly, spending an hour and a half of your life on White's painting is only worth it if you don't have any more interesting options at all.
Made from recycled, conditionally edible action movie.
A simple story about a runaway Romanian convict.
A Romanian low-budget film that won a prize at a prestigious international film festival.
In principle, having only these data at hand, one can vividly imagine the hypothetical content of the picture, and even some specific details of the form.
Without a doubt, cinema promises to be acutely social.
Of course, it will be realistic, and hardcore, too.
The likelihood of participation of non-professional actors is high.
There will also be a lot of Romanian poverty in the film ( yes, poverty does not know nationality, but Romanian, as our festival laureates prove from film to film, is especially poor) .

Also, without knowing the year of release, you can easily mistake what is happening on the screen for the exercises of some underground critical realists from the Warsaw Pact countries, who were given a lecture on Bresson in the early 80s.
The film won the Grand Jury Prize at the Berlin IFF.
The script is based on a play by Andrey Valean, whose work is in particular demand among the directors of the Romanian New Wave.
Operator Marius Panduru often works with Corneliu Porumboiu.

All of the above is also true for the debut work of Florin Serban, and-please understand us correctly-it is not at all abusive, but recommendatory in nature: the Romanian New Wave is in that blissful stage of development when the faith of its representatives in the methods of its representatives is used.
of his work has not yet wavered at the moment.

And this moment must be seized: only thanks to this faith can one endure the one and a half hour spectacle of the Romanian juvenile colony and surrender to the charisma of the most talented Pistereanu ( whose history, despite the abyss separating the two cultures, can easily be seen, despite the abyss separating the two cultures) .
convert it into an exploitation a la the 70s, with a cowboy deciding to take a walk from the prison, from where he is about to leave, to the nearest saloon) .
CAST Georg Pistereanu, Ada Condeescu, Mihai Constantin, Clara Voda, Marian Bratu.
СЮЖЕТ: Оттрубив свои четыре года, 18-летний зэк Сильвиу (Пистереану) скоро должен выйти на свободу, но неожиданно выясняет, что мать хочет забрать его младшего брата с собой в Италию.
С этого момента поведение молодого человека становится неадекватным.
Интрижка с соцработником Анной еще больше сподвигает парня на отчаянные поступки, смысл которых исчерпывается названием картины.
Какая же все это ерунда!
Хотите смотреть - смотрите.
Неплохой дебют, внушающий слабую надежду, что из румынского артхауса когда-нибудь вырастет приличное направление
Мультфильм о радостях злодейства и семейной жизни

Режиссерский дебют человека по фамилии Гроб (Соп) и его соавтора Рено сделан под эгидой продюсера Кристофера Меледандри, серого кардинала американской мультипликации, ответственного, в частности, за все «Ледниковые периоды», «Хортона» и «Роботов».

«Гадкий я», наверное, лучшая работа его команды: картина прекрасно нарисована (кстати, имеет смысл смотреть в ЗО), особенно, если вы любите, когда разные объекты то и дело норовят выпрыгнуть с экрана в зал), сносно написана, и, главное, здесь нет ни одной нижепоясной шутки, из-за которых на «Ледниковых периодах» приходилось стыдливо вжиматься в кресло и закрывать детские ушки руками.
Понятно, что причиной смены курса стало не чувство меры авторов, а вопиющая асексуальность главного героя, каковая в свою очередь продиктована нежеланием как бы то ни было касаться темы педофилии.
За «взрослую» часть здесь, помимо основной коллизии одинокого отцовства, отвечает довольно жесткий черный юмор (которым, хочется думать, мы обязаны режиссеру Коффину).
В целом, это очень симпатичное кино - настолько, что в какой-то момент оказывается даже слишком совершенным и правильным.
Чувствуется кропотливая работа слаженной команды маркетологов, продумавших каждую мелочь, чтобы фильм понравился всем категориям граждан.
Не то чтобы мы хотели увидеть, как героев детского мультика съедят каннибалы или погубит атомный взрыв

СЮЖЕТ: Носатый злодей Грю, чьи детские мечты о космонавтике с годами трансформировались в идею украсть Луну, для исполнения великого плана и устранения юного конкурента вынужден прибегнуть к помощи детей.
В некоем продвинутом приюте он усыновляет трех сироток женского пола — Марго в очках, Эдит в шапочке и Агнес, по убойной степени умильности сравнимую лишь с котиком из «Шрэка».
Как оно обычно и бывает, дети сходу преобразовывают планы взрослых.
Главный герой срисован с Кристофера Меледандри - оба они лысы, носаты и склонны к черному юмору.
В оригинале главных героев озвучивали Стив Каррелл и Джейсон Сигел.
В финале Грю танцует партию Траволты
К заброшенному трейлеру где-то посреди условной пустыни подкатывает тачка, из которой выходят три пары добротнейших сисек.
Именно так.
Сами по себе носительницы этого дара не так существенны.
Камера уверенно фиксирует внимание на этой части тела.
Для ценителей сразу сообщаем хорошую новость — весь фильм выдержан в том же духе.
Рик Джейкобсон понимает в женской красоте самые правильные вещи и кастинг провел такой, что происходящее на экране имеет второстепенное значение.
А происходит много всего забавного.
«Брокерша», «киллерша» и «стриптизерша» роются в песке, обливаются водой (не спрашивайте, зачем), несут какую-то пургу и периодически совершенно люто дерутся.
Создатели считают, что матерящаяся телка с щедрыми формами, вымазанная в грязи, с разбитым носом и сияющими белизной зубами - это круто.
«Стервозные штучки» прежде всего ориентированы на классические сексплотейшн-ленты.
Рик Джейкобсон снимал эпизоды «Зены -— королевы воинов» и «Удивительных странствий Геракла».
Близкий по духу фильм в московском прокате — «Ствол для Дженнифер».

Еще круто, когда стервозная красотка крутит яйца бандиту, долбанутый панк дерется в паре с японкой-школьницей, к этому прилагается самурайский меч и лесбийский секс; а интрига раскручивается посредством бесконечного количества флэш-беков.
В общем, для кино-фетишиста здесь обнаруживается настоящий Клондайк удовольствий.
Понятно, разумеется, что Джейкобсон и его банда, снимая эту трэш-пародию, веселились от души, но сама по себе задача кажется довольно странной.
Если бы не физические данные актрис, скучно стало бы уже к середине.
Можно предположить, что эта дичь пришла к нам с ночного канала для взрослых (Джейкобсон, кстати, часто берется за сериальные эпизоды)
В РОЛЯХ: Джулия Вот, Эрин Каммингс, Америка Оливо, Майкл Херст, Рон Мелендес

STORY: After serving a four-year sentence, 18-year-old prisoner Silviu (Piștereanu) will soon be given his freedom. However, it unexpectedly comes to light that his mother wants to take his younger brother away with her to Italy.
From that moment onwards, the young man's behavior becomes unacceptable.
Romantic intrigue with a social worker named Ana further spurs the young man towards desperate acts, the essence of which is extracted in the name of the film.
It's all just such nonsense!
If you want to watch it, then watch.
It's a decent debut providing a modicum of hope that, someday, Romanian art-house cinema will begin to develop in a decent direction
A cartoon about the joys of being evil and of family life

This directorial debut of a man with the last name Coffin (Sop) and his coauthor Renaud was made under the auspices of producer Christopher Meledandri, the éminence grise of American animated films who, notably, was responsible for Ice Age, Horton Hears a Who, and Robots.

Despicable Me is, quite possibly, his team's best work yet: the film is beautifully animated (it is, by the way, worth watching even if you're 30 — especially if you like it when objects occasionally try to jump out of the screen and into the theater), intelligently written, and, most importantly, is without a single "below-the-belt" joke of the type that, in Ice Age, makes you to press yourself into your chair out of embarrassment and cover your kids' ears with your hands.

Given, the reason behind this change in direction was not the writers' good sense, but rather the protagonist's extreme asexuality which, in turn, was dictated by a desire to, no matter what, avoid the topic of pedophilia.
The "adult" part of the film, aside from the basic conflict of single fatherhood, is provided by the rather harsh dark humor (for which, one would like to think, we are indebted to director Coffin).
In all, it's a very likable film — so much so, in fact, that at a certain point it becomes even too perfect and correct.
You can feel the work of the corporate team of marketers who thought through every detail to ensure that the film would be liked by every category of viewer.
That's not to say that we want to see the characters in kid's films get eaten by cannibals or die in a nuclear explosion

STORY: The large-nosed villain Gru, whose childhood dreams of becoming an astronaut have over the years morphed into the idea of stealing the Moon, finds himself needing to enlist the help of children to carry out his great plan and rid himself of a young competitor.
He adopts three female orphans from some kind of progressive orphanage: Margo who wears glasses, Edith who wears a hat, and Agnes, whose lethal cuteness could only be compared to the cat in Shrek.
As it usually goes, in the course of events the children transform the plans of the adults.
The protagonist was drawn from Christopher Meledandri: they're both bald, large-nosed, and have a tendency towards dark humor.
In the original, the main characters are voiced by Steve Carell and Jason Segel.
At the end of the film, Gru dances like John Travolta
Somewhere in a desertlike landscape, a car rolls up to an abandoned trailer and from it emerge three pairs of excellent tits.
Literally.
The women who bear this blessing are themselves of little importance.
The camera confidently fixes its attention on that specific body part.
For fans of this, I've got good news: the whole films carries on in the same spirit.
Rick Jacobson understands what's what in female beauty and conducted casting in such a way that all the action on the screen is only of secondary importance.
And lots of amusing things happen.
Camero, Hel, and Trixie dig around in the sand, pour water on themselves (don't ask why), spew all kinds of nonsense, and periodically break out into wild fights.
The creators think that a swearing dame with a nice body, covered in mud, and with a broken nose is super cool.
Bitch Slap is primarily oriented towards the classic sexploitation genre.
Rick Jacobson filmed episodes of Xena: Warrior Princess and Hercules: The Legendary Journeys.
The film closest to it in spirit that's showing in Moscow is A Gun for Jennifer.

It's also super cool that the bitchy beauties kick a bandit in the crotch and that a dimwit punk goes around with a Japanese schoolgirl, to which is added a samurai sword and lesbian sex; and intrigue is built through an endless number of flashbacks.
In all, a film fetishist will find a true gold mind of pleasure here.
Of course, it goes without saying that Jacobson and his gang had a ball of a time filming this trash parody, but the task itself seems rather strange.
If it weren't for the physical qualities of the actresses, you'd already be bored halfway through.
It'd be reasonable to assume that this doozie came to us from nighttime channels for adults (Jacobson does, in fact, often film TV episodes)
STARRING: Julia Voth, Erin Cummings, America Olivo, Michael Hurst, Ron Melendez

For the "adult" part here, in addition to the main conflict of lonely fatherhood, quite tough black humor is responsible (which, I would like to think, we owe to the director Coffin).
In general, this is a very cute movie - so much so that at some point it turns out to be even too perfect and correct.
One feels the painstaking work of a well-coordinated team of marketers who have thought over every little thing so that all categories of citizens like the film.
Not that we wanted to see how the heroes of the children's cartoon would be eaten by cannibals or killed by an atomic explosion

PLOT: Nosy villain Gru, whose childhood dreams of astronautics have transformed over the years into the idea of ​ ​ stealing the moon, is forced to resort to the help of children to fulfill a great plan and eliminate a young competitor.
In a certain advanced shelter, he adopts three female orphans - Margot in glasses, Edith in a hat and Agnes, comparable in lethal degree to only a cat from Shrek.
As is usually the case, children immediately transform the plans of adults.
The main character is copied from Christopher Meledandri - both of them are bald, nosy and prone to black humor.
In the original, the main characters were voiced by Steve Carrell and Jason Siegel.
In the final, Gru dances the part of Travolta
A wheelbarrow rolls up to an abandoned trailer somewhere in the middle of a conditional desert, from which three pairs of solid boobs come out.
Exactly.
The carriers of this gift themselves are not so essential.
The camera confidently captures attention on this part of the body.
For connoisseurs, we immediately inform the good news - the whole film is sustained in the same spirit.
Rick Jacobson understands the most correct things in female beauty and the casting was such that what is happening on the screen is of secondary importance.
And there's a lot of fun going on.
"Broker," "killer" and "stripper" dig in the sand, pour water (do not ask why), carry some kind of blizzard and periodically fight completely fiercely.
The creators believe that a swearing heifer with generous shapes, smeared in mud, with a broken nose and teeth shining with whiteness is cool.
"Bitchy things" are primarily focused on classic sexploitation tapes.
Rick Jacobson filmed episodes of Xena - Warrior Queens and The Amazing Wanderings of Hercules.
A similar-minded film at the Moscow box office is "Trunk for Jennifer."

It's also cool when a bitchy beauty spins eggs to a bandit, fucking punk fights in tandem with a Japanese schoolgirl, a samurai sword and lesbian sex are attached to this; and the intrigue is spun through endless flash-backs.

If not for the physical data of the actresses, it would have become boring by the middle.
It can be assumed that this game came to us from the night channel for adults (Jacobson, by the way, often takes on serial episodes)
CAST: Julia Voth, Erin Cummings, America Olivo, Michael Hurst, Ron Melendez
PLOT: After serving off his four years, 18-year-old prisoner Silvius ( Pistereanu) is soon to be released, but suddenly finds out that his mother wants to take his younger brother with her to Italy.
From this point on, the behavior of the young man becomes inappropriate.
An affair with a social worker Anna further encourages the guy to desperate acts, the meaning of which is exhausted by the title of the picture.
What nonsense this is all?
If you want to watch, watch.
A good debut, inspiring faint hope that a decent direction will someday grow out of the Romanian arthouse.
A cartoon about the joys of villainy and family life.

The directorial debut of a man named Coffin ( Sop) and his co-author Reno is made under the auspices of producer Christopher Meledandri, the gray cardinal of American animation, responsible, in particular, for all Ice Ages, Horton and Robots, in particular, for all Ice Ages, Horton and Robots.

СЮЖЕТ: Три опасные красотки привозят в пустыню главаря мафии, у которого где-то здесь спрятаны бриллианты на солидную сумму.
Ничего не добившись и застрелив несчастного бандита, бабы начинают цапаться, драться друг с другом и периодически прибывающими откуда-то отморозками, а также регулярно целоваться и тискаться.
По ходу дела выясняется, что все трое не те, кем представлялись в начале.
Видимо, по мнению автора, так еще забавней.
Продукт для узкого круга любителей чудовищного дурновкусия
Да, со своей последней картиной «Судный день», разбодяженным «Безумным Максом» для неимущих, Маршалл дал серьезную осечку
Кровожадный и кусачий пеплум возвращает режиссеру пошатнувшееся доверие.
Новый неполиткорректный и угрюмый магнум опус не стесняется скромного бюджета, очевидных источников вдохновения и свирепой киноэстетики категории «Б».
Есть в картине и хулиганский кураж «Псов-воинов», и звериная жестокость «Спуска».
«План Маршалла» по очищению «пеплума» от налипшей пост-гладиаторской киногрязи, в целом, сработал.
В 2011 свою интерпретацию истории Девятого Легиона представит Кевин Макдональд.

Его покрытые боевыми шрамами легионеры (помимо прочих, неожиданно колоритные Дэйвид Моррисси и Лиам Каннингэм) — суровые мужики, пытающиеся поженить свой воинский долг с непреодолимым желанием выжить.
Смертоубийство и пикантные подробности отправления естественных нужд в античные времена здесь изображены с любовью и обстоятельностью.

Сцена истребления Девятого Легиона, на которую ушло много бюджетных денег, напрямую инспирирована вступительной раздачей в германских лесах из теперь уже эталонного «Гладиатора» сэра Ридли Скотта, но пытаться уличать Маршалла в плагиате почему-то абсолютно не хочется: он работает честно и без претензий.
В РОЛЯХ: Майкл Фассбендер, Ольга Куриленко, Доминик Уэст, Лиам Каннингэм, Дэйвид Моррисси
СЮЖЕТ: Земли современной Шотландии, оккупированные Священной Римской Империей.
Отдаленный форпост, где проходит службу центурион Куинтус Диас (Фассбендер), безжалостно разгромлен разведротой пиктов.

Чудом спасшийся Диас вынужден сначала примкнуть к печально знаменитому Девятому Легиону, а затем, с кучкой других выживших римлян, попытаться улизнуть от группы пиктских боевиков под предводительством садистки Итэйн (Куриленко).
Тонкому артхаусному артисту пока удалось отвоевать в Голливуде лишь острохарактерные роли второго плана, но очень хочется верить, что после «Центуриона» ситуация изменится.
Пеплум -— издание исправленное и дополненное.
Почти как «Гладиатор», только скромнее и суровее

Продолжение истории про школьницу Беллу (Кристен Стюарт) и ее сложные отношения с двумя крайне перспективными молодыми людьми — бледнолицым вампиром Эдвардом (Роберт Паттинсон) и оборотнем-культуристом Джейкобом (Тэйлор Лотнер).
Поклонницы Паттинсона затаили дыхание.
Масштабная киноверсия мультсериала про лысого мальчика-колдуна, призванного принести мир четырем царствам.
Повелитель огня затеял кровопролитную войну и подчинил себе соседей.
Юный Аанг сможет остановить его, только если научится управлять всеми стихиями и станет Аватаром.
Дом Кобб (Леонардо ДиКаприо) умеет похищать чужие мысли и не покладая рук трудится на поприще промышленного шпионажа.
Проникая в сон объекта, он заставляет спящий мозг работать по своим правилам.
Но в этот раз ему предстоит проделать обратное — оставить в одной голове то, чего там не было.
Живописный урок по управлению иллюзорными мирами от Кристофера Нолана.
Опытный волшебник (Николас Кейдж) находит себе юного помощника в надежде вдвоем одолеть злого мага (Альфред Молина).
При помощи разрушительных заклинаний они устроят посреди Манхэттена бедлам с драконами и взрывами.
Лысая, как бильярдный шар, киса замыслила захватить весь мир, и теперь собаки-суперагенты вынуждены объединить усилия со своими мяукующими антагонистами.
Вторая серия пушистой семейной комедии.
PLOT: Three dangerous beauties take a mafia boss out into the desert where he's hidden a pretty penny's worth of diamonds.

After finding nothing and killing the hapless criminal, the gals start to scratch and punch at one another and, periodically, at thugs who appear out of nowhere. They also frequently kiss and press against one another.
In the course of events it becomes clear that all three are not who they seemed to be at the beginning.
Apparently, in the opinion of the screenwriter, that makes everything especially funny.
This is a product for the narrow audience of people who love things made with horrifically bad taste
Indeed, with his last film Doomsday, a watered down off-brand Mad Max, Marshall seriously misfired
But this bloodthirsty and biting sword-and-sandal flick has reestablished our faith in the director.
This non–politically correct and grim magnum opus is not ashamed of its small budget, obvious sources of inspiration, or savage B-movie aesthetic.
The film offers the thug-like swagger of Dog Warriors and the savage cruelty of The Descent.
This "Marshall Plan" to clean the post-Gladiator cinematic mud off of the sword-and-sandal genre, on the whole, worked.
In 2011, Kevin Macdonald will present his interpretation of the history of the Ninth Legion.

His legionaries who are covered in battle scars (among them the unexpectedly expressive David Morrissey and Liam Cunningham), are tough guys trying to join their duty as warriors with their insurmountable desire to live.
Murder and all the exciting details of natural needs set in ancient times are here displayed with love and consideration.

The scene depicting the destruction of the Ninth Legion, which ate up much of the budget, is a direct recreation of the initial scene with soldiers going out into the German forest in Sir Ridley Scott's Gladiator, which has set the gold standard. But for some reason there's absolutely no desire to try accusing Marshall of plagiarism: he does his job honestly and unpretentiously.
STARRING: Michael Fassbender, Olga Kurylenko, Dominic West, Liam Cunningham, David Morrissey
PLOT: The land that is modern-day Scotland, occupied by the Holy Roman Empire.
The distant fore-post where the centurion Quintus Dias (Fassbender) is serving is cruelly destroyed by a Pictish reconnaissance troop.

Dias, who is miraculously saved, is first forced to join the infamous Ninth Legion, and then with a bunch of other Romans who have survived, try to slip away from the group of Pictish soldiers under the leadership of the sadistic Etain (Kurylenko).
This thin arthouse actress has so far only managed to lay claim to colorful supporting roles in Hollywood, but one very much wants to believe that this will change after Centurion.
Sword-and-sandal: a corrected and supplemented edition.
Almost like Gladiator, but a bit more modest and darker.

A continuation of the story about the schoolgirl Bella (Kristen Stewart) and her complicated relationships with two very promising young men: the pale-faced vampire Edward (Robert Pattinson) and the bodybuilding werewolf Jacob (Taylor Lautner).
Pattinson's fangirls are waiting with bated breath.
The blockbuster film version of the cartoon about a bald boy wizard who's been called to bring peace to the four kingdoms.
The fire nation has started a bloody war and subjugated its neighbors.
Young Aang can stop the war, but only if he learns to control all the elements and becomes the Avatar.
Dom Cobb (Leonardo DiCaprio) is able to steal other people's thoughts and works tirelessly in the field of industrial espionage.
Penetrating into the dreams of his subjects, he forces the sleeping brains to operate by his own rules.
But this time he has to do the opposite: leave in someone's mind something that wasn't there before.
This is a picturesque lesson in navigating illusory worlds from Christopher Nolan.
An experienced sorcerer (Nicholas Cage) finds himself a young assistant in hopes that the two will together be able to best an evil mage (Alfred Molina).
Using destructive spells, they create a pandemonium of dragons and explosions in the middle of Manhattan.
A cat as bald as a cue ball has thought up a plot to capture the whole world, and now superagent dogs must join forces with their meowing nemeses.
The second installment in this furry family comedy.
PLOT: Three dangerous beauties bring a mafia boss to the desert, who has diamonds hidden somewhere here worth a substantial amount.
Having achieved nothing and having shot a hapless bandit, the women start to squabble, fight with each other and periodically arriving thugs from somewhere, as well as regularly kissing and cuddling.
As things progress, it turns out that all three are not who they appeared to be at the beginning.
Apparently, the author thinks it's even funnier this way.
A product for a niche group of fans with atrocious taste.
Yes, with his latest film "Doomsday", a ragged "Mad Max" for the poor, Marshall made a serious blunder.
The bloodthirsty and biting peplum restores the director's shaken confidence.
The new politically incorrect and gloomy magnum opus is not shy of a modest budget, obvious sources of inspiration, and fierce B-movie aesthetics.
The painting also features the hooligan bravado of "Dogs-Warriors", and the beastly cruelty of "The Descent".
The "Marshall Plan" for cleaning up the "peplum" from the stuck post-gladiatorial film dirt, overall, worked.
In 2011, Kevin MacDonald will present his interpretation of the story of the Ninth Legion.
His battle-scarred legionnaires (among others, unexpectedly colorful David Morrissey and Liam Cunningham) are tough guys, trying to marry their warrior duty with an irresistible desire to survive.
The act of suicide and the spicy details of natural needs in ancient times are depicted here with love and circumstance.

The scene of the Ninth Legion's extermination, which consumed a large portion of the budget, is directly inspired by the introductory battle in the German forests from the now iconic "Gladiator" by Sir Ridley Scott. However, there is no desire to accuse Marshall of plagiarism: he works honestly and without pretension.
CAST: Michael Fassbender, Olga Kurylenko, Dominic West, Liam Cunningham, David Morrissey

Miraculously surviving, Dias is first forced to join the notoriously infamous Ninth Legion, and then, with a handful of other surviving Romans, try to slip away from a group of Pictish militants led by the sadistic Etain (Kurylenko).
The subtle art-house actor has so far only managed to win sharply characterized supporting roles in Hollywood, but there is a strong hope that the situation will change after "Centurion".

Miraculously rescued, Diaz is forced to first join the infamous Ninth Legion, and then, with a handful of other surviving Romans, try to sneak away from a group of Pictish militants led by the sadist Itain ( Kurylenko) .
The subtle arthouse artist has so far managed to win back only sharply characteristic supporting roles in Hollywood, but I really want to believe that after "Centurion" the situation will change.
Peplum is a corrected and supplemented edition.
Almost like "Gladiator", only more modest and severe.

Continuation of the story about schoolgirl Bella ( Kristen Stewart) and her complex relationship with two extremely promising young people - the pale-faced vampire Edward ( Robert Pattinson) and the werewolf bodybuilder Jacob ( Taylor Lautner) .
Pattinson's fans held their breath.
A large-scale film version of the animated series about a bald boy sorcerer, designed to bring peace to the four kingdoms.
The lord of fire started a bloody war and subjugated his neighbors to himself.
Young Aang will only be able to stop him if he learns to control all the elements, and becomes the Avatar, only if he learns to control all the elements.
Dom Cobb ( Leonardo DiCaprio) knows how to steal other people's thoughts and works tirelessly in the field of industrial espionage.
Penetrating into the dream of the object, he forces the sleeping brain to work according to its own rules.
But this time he will have to do the opposite - leave in one head what was not there, which was not there.
A picturesque lesson on managing illusory worlds from Christopher Nolan.
An experienced wizard ( Nicolas Cage) finds a young assistant in the hope of defeating the evil magician ( Alfred Molina) together.
With the help of destructive spells, they will arrange a bedlam in the middle of Manhattan with dragons and explosions.
Bald as a billiard ball, a kitty has conceived to take over the whole world, and now super-agent dogs are forced to join forces with their meowing antagonists.
The second series of the furry family comedy.
Несколько отпетых головорезов во главе с хлипким на вид Ройсом (Эдриен Броуди) загадочным образом оказываются на другой планете, где на них открывают спортивную охоту стильные клыкастые инопланетяне.
Возвращение культового персонажа 80-х на большой экран.

Обратите внимание на Джорджа Клуни, который объединился с рок-фотографом-ныне-режиссером Антоном Корбайном («Контроль») для весьма любопытного экзистенциального исследования психологии стареющего наемного убийцы, прячущегося от людей в небольшом итальянском городке и сзапозданием постигающего человеческую природу.
«Художник-визионер масштаба Корбайна и великолепный Джордж Клуни - это киносоюз, заключенный на небесах», — хвастается студийный пресс-релиз.
Кроме того, этот проект — еще одно подтверждение самых долгих любовных отношений в жизни Клуни - с Италией: съемки проходили в живописном городке Кастель-дель-Монте в Абруццо.

Взяв за основу роман Мартина Бута «Очень скрытный джентльмен», Роуэн Джоффе внес в свой сценарий кое-какие коррективы: место рассказчика-англичанина занял вынесенный в заглавие американец, а из оружейника-нелегала главный герой превратился в простого убийцу.

В остальном история близка к оригиналу: пока киллер Джек пытается разобраться со своим последним делом и окончательно завязать с доходным ремеслом, его ледяное сердце тает под обаянием местного священника (Паоло Боначелли) и уличной проститутки (Текла Рютен), в которую персонаж Клуни моментально влюбляется.
«Джек искушает судьбу, - гласит официальный синопсис.
Опасный посланник тьмы приближается к нему все ближе и ближе, а загадочная дама, которая его нанимает, вполне может оказаться не той, за которую себя выдает».
Если судить по трейлеру, визуальные эксперименты Корбайна, приправленные пепельной шевелюрой Клуни (фильм похож на длинный клип 02), вышли на качественно новый уровень.
Дэниел Рэдклифф сыграет главную роль в экранизации «На западном фронте без перемен» Ремарка
А можно я вас из фоторужья щелкну!?
Джонни Деппа в этом сезоне можно было увидеть в двух местах одновременно.
Во-первых, в Венеции на съемочной площадке триллера «Турист» Флориана Хенкеля фон Доннерсмарка («Жизнь других»).
Там он играет влюбленного в героиню Анджелины Джоли туриста.
Во-вторых, в Пуэрто Рико на площадке «Ромового дневника», экранизации дебютного романа легендарного Хантера С. Томпсона.
Режиссером и сценаристом проекта выступает Брюс Робинсон («Уитнэйл и Я»), последней режиссерской работой которого был триллер «Дженнифер 8» в 1992 году.
Глядя на работу плакатистов отечественной тюремной драмы, можно даже не сомневаться в том, что их вдохновило.
Но нельзя же подходить к вопросу реализации идеи буквально!
Впрочем, хорошо хотя бы то, что героиня российской картины хоть и чужая, но совсем не лысая.
Режиссер Дэннис Дуган в основном специализируется на проектах с Адамом Сэндлером.
На их счету уже четыре совместных проекта: «Счастливчик Гилмор», «Большой папа», «Чак и Ларри: Пожарная свадьба», «Не шутите с Гоханом!».
В июле выходит пятая комедия — «Одноклассники», в работе шестая — «Жена-притворщица» с Дженнифер Энистон и Николь Кидман.
В график также заложен и седьмой фильм — романтическая комедия «Джек и Джилл», где Сэндлеру предстоит одновременно сыграть Джека и его сестру-близнеца Джилл.
Мэттью Вон, запомнившийся зрителю в этом году феерическим боевиком «Пипец», займется перезагрузкой Людей Икс.
В картину «Люди Икс: Первый класс» режиссер первым делом позвал Джеймса МакЭвоя, отведя ему роль молодого профессора Икс.
Розамунд Пайк сыграет мутанта-телепата Эмму Фрост по прозвищу Белая Королева, Эмбер Херд перевоплотится в синекожую Мистику, а Майкл Фассбендер предположительно станет Магнето.
В то время как съемки новой серии Бондианы откладываются, ее новый режиссер Сэм Мендес скучать не успевает.
В списке его дел стоит мюзикл «Чарли и шоколадная фабрика» и экранизация романа Изэна Макьюзна «На берегу».
Сценарий адаптирует сам автор.
Кэри Маллиган предложена главная женская роль.
Гари Олдман рассматривает роль практичного майора Джорджа Смайли - главного героя серии романов Джона Ле Каре - в экранизации триллера «Шпион, выйди вон!».
В первой адаптации этого произведения в 1979 году играл Алек Гиннесс.
Новую версию снимет датский режиссер Томас Альфредсон, создатель хоррора «Впусти меня».
Том Тыквер адаптирует фантастический роман-бестселлер Дэвида Митчелла «Облачный атлас».
По признанию режиссера, это нелегкая (в романе шесть параллельных сюжетных линий), но крайне интересная работа.
Предложения от него уже поступили Тому Хэнксу, Халле Берри, Джеймсу МакЭвою, Иэну МакКелену и Натали Портман.
В Крыму проходят съемки интернационального боевика Максима Коростышевского под рабочим названием «Солдаты удачи».
Он посвящен миллионерам, отправившимся за свои деньги на настоящую войну в поисках адреналина.
В ролях заняты Кристиан Слейтер, Шон Бин, Винг Рэймс, Доминик Монаган, Оксана Коростышевская и другие.
Премьера фильма намечена на начало 2011 года.
Сэм Рокуэлл сыграет в комедии «Младенец Иисус» вместе с английской поп-звездой Пикси Лотг
A group of over-the-hill ruffians led by the frail-looking Royce (Adrien Brody) mysteriously find themselves on another planet where stylish, fanged aliens declare open hunting season on them.
The return of the 80's cult hero to the big screen.

Keep your attention on George Clooney, who joined forces with rock-photographer-become-director Anton Corbijn (Control) for an extremely curious, existential investigation into the psychology of an aging hit man in hiding in a large Italian city and who, late in life, comes into touch with human nature.
"An artistic visionary of Corbijn's stature and the great George Clooney make a cinematic team from heaven," touts the studio press-release.
Aside from that, this project is yet further confirmation of Clooney's long romantic relationship with Italy: the film was shot in the picturesque city of Castel de Monte in Abruzzo.

Based on Martin Booth's novel A Very Private Gentleman, Rowan Joffé made a number of changes in his screenplay: the place of the narrating Englishman was taken by the eponymous American, and the criminal gunsmith was turned into a simple assassin.

Otherwise, the story is close to the original: while the killer Jack tries to finish up his last piece of business and finally get out of his lucrative line of work, his icy heart is melted by the local priest (Paolo Bonacelli) and a street-working prostitute (Thekla Reuten), whom Clooney's character immediately falls in love with.
"Jack tempts fate," the official synopsis reads.
"A dangerous emissary of darkness draws nearer and nearer to him, and the mysterious lady who has hired him may not be who she claims."
Judging from the trailer, Corbijn's visual experiments, buttressed by Clooney's melancholy silhouette (the film resembles a long clip from 02), have emerged on a qualitatively new level.
Daniel Radcliffe is set to play the lead role in the film adaptation of Remarque's All Quiet on the Western Front
Might I take your picture with my photo apparatus?!
This season, you can see Johnny Depp appearing in two places at once.
First in Venice, on the set of the thriller The Tourist from director Florian Henckel von Donnersmarck (The Lives of Others).
There, he plays a tourist who is in love with Angelina Jolie's character.
Secondly, you can see him in Puerto Rico on the set of The Rum Diary, a film adaptation of the legendary Hunter S. Thompson's debut novel.
The project's director and screenwriter is Bruce Robinson (Withnail and I), whose last work as a director was the thriller Jennifer 8 back in 1992.
Looking at the work of the poster artists for this Russian prison drama, there's no question as to where they drew their inspiration.
But you can't approach the idea from a literal angle!
That said, it's good that the female protagonist of the Russian picture, despite being strange, at least isn't bald.
Director Dennis Dugan mostly specializes in films starring Adam Sandler.
They've already racked up four films together: Happy Gilmore, Big Daddy, I Now Pronounce You Chuck & Larry, and You Don't Mess with the Zohan.
July will see the release of their fifth film, Grown Ups; and their sixth, Just Go with It, starring Jennifer Aniston and Nicole Kidman, is in production.
They've already penciled in a seventh film as well — the romcom Jack and Jill — where Sandler simultaneously plays Jack and his twin sister Jill.
Matthew Vaughn, who made an impression on viewers this year with his explosive action film Kick-Ass, will work on the reboot of X-Men.
The director of X-Men: First Class immediately recruited James McAvoy to the film, giving him the role of a young Professor X.
Rosamund Pike plays the mutant telepath Emma Frost, known as the White Queen; Amber Heard transforms into the blue-skinned Mystique; and Michael Fassbender will potentially portray Magnito.
Though the filming of the new James Bond movie has been put off, its new director Sam Mendes is keeping busy.
His to-do list includes a musical of Charlie and the Chocolate Factory and a film adaptation of Ian McEwan's novel On Chesil Beach.
The screenplay is being adapted by the author himself.
Carey Mulligan has been offered the lead female role.
Gary Oldman is considering the role of hard-headed major George Smiley, the protagonist of John la Carré's series of novels, in the film adaptation of the thriller Tinker Taylor Soldier Spy.
Alec Guinness acted in the novel's first film adaptation in 1979.
The new version will be filmed by the Danish director Tomas Alfredson, the creator of the horror film Let the Right One In.
Tom Tykwer is adapting David Michell's sci-fi best-seller Cloud Atlas for the screen.
The director admits that the work is not easy (the novel features six parallel plot lines), but is extremely interesting.
He has already offered roles to Tom Hanks, Halle Berry, James McAvoy, Ian McKellen, and Natalie Portman.
Maxim Korostyshevsky's international action film with the working name Soldiers of Fortune is being filmed in Crimea.
The film takes as its subject millionaire adrenaline junkies who pay their own money to be sent into a real war.
It stars Christian Slater, Sean Bean, Ving Rhames, Dominic Monaghan, Oksana Korostyshevskaya, and others.
The film's premier is slated for early 2011.
Sam Rockwell will star in the comedy Sweet Baby Jesus alongside English pop star Pixie Lott
A group of hardened killers, led by the seemingly frail Royce (Adrien Brody), mysteriously find themselves on another planet, where stylish fanged aliens hunt them for sport.
The return of the iconic character from the 80s to the big screen.

Pay attention to George Clooney, who teamed up with rock-photographer-turned-director Anton Corbijn ("Control") for a very intriguing existential exploration of the psychology of an aging hitman, hiding from people in a small Italian town and belatedly understanding human nature.

Furthermore, this project is another confirmation of the longest love affair in Clooney's life - with Italy: the filming took place in the picturesque town of Castel del Monte in Abruzzo.

Otherwise, the story is close to the original: while the killer Jack is trying to sort out his last case and finally quit his lucrative craft, his icy heart melts under the charm of a local priest (Paolo Bonacelli) and a street prostitute (Thekla Reuten), whom Clooney's character instantly falls in love with.
"Jack tempts fate," reads the official synopsis.
A dangerous messenger of darkness is getting closer and closer to him, and the mysterious lady who hires him may well not be who she claims to be.
Judging by the trailer, Corbain's visual experiments, spiced up with Clooney's ash-grey hair (the film looks like a long clip 02), have reached a qualitatively new level.

Johnny Depp could be seen in two places at the same time this season.
First, in Venice on the set of Florian Henkel von Donnersmarck's thriller The Tourist (The Lives of Others).
There he plays a tourist in love with Angelina Jolie's heroine.
Secondly, in Puerto Rico, on the site of The Rum Diary, an adaptation of the debut novel by the legendary Hunter S. Thompson.
The project is directed and written by Bruce Robinson (Whitnale & Me), whose last directorial work was the thriller Jennifer 8 in 1992.
Looking at the work of the posters of the Russian prison drama, one can not even doubt what inspired them.
But you can't approach the issue of implementing the idea literally!
However, at least the good thing is that the heroine of the Russian film, although alien, is not bald at all.
Director Dennis Dugan mainly focuses on projects with Adam Sandler.
They already have four joint projects: Lucky Gilmore, Big Dad, Chuck and Larry: Fire Wedding, and Don't Mess with Gohan!
In July, the fifth comedy, Odnoklassniki, is released, and the sixth is “The Pretender Wife” with Jennifer Aniston and Nicole Kidman.
The schedule also includes a seventh film, the romantic comedy Jack and Jill, where Sandler will simultaneously play Jack and his twin sister Jill.
Matthew Vaughn, who will be remembered by the audience this year for the enchanting action movie “Kick-Ass”, will reboot the X-Men.
The director first invited James McAvoy to the film “X-Men: First Class”, giving him the role of young Professor X.
Rosamund Pike will play the telepathic mutant Emma Frost, nicknamed the White Queen, Amber Heard will be reincarnated as blue-skinned Mystique, and Michael Fassbender is expected to become Magneto.
While filming for the new Bond series is being postponed, its new director Sam Mendes does not have time to get bored.
His to-do list includes the musical Charlie and the Chocolate Factory and an adaptation of Isan McUzen's novel “On the Beach”.
The script is adapted by the author himself.
Carey Mulligan has been offered the lead female role.
Gary Oldman considers the role of practical Major George Smiley - the protagonist of the John Le Caré series - in the film adaptation of the thriller Spy, Get Out!
Alec Guinness played the first adaptation of this work in 1979.
The new version will be shot by Danish director Thomas Alfredson, creator of the horror film Let Me In.
Tom Tykwer is adapting David Mitchell's best-selling science fiction novel Cloud Atlas.
According to the director, this is not an easy one (the novel has six parallel storylines), but it is an extremely interesting work.
Tom Hanks, Hull Berry, James McAvoy, Ian McKelen and Natalie Portman have already made offers from him.
International action movie Maxim Korostyshevsky under the working title “Soldiers of Fortune” is being filmed in Crimea.
It is dedicated to millionaires who went to war for their money in search of adrenaline.
The roles are played by Christian Slater, Sean Bean, Ving Rhames, Dominic Monaghan, Oksana Korostyshevskaya and others.
The film is scheduled to premiere in early 2011.
Sam Rockwell will star in the comedy “Baby Jesus” with English pop star Pixie Lotg
Several inveterate thugs, led by a flimsy-looking Royce (Adrien Brody), mysteriously find themselves on another planet, where stylish fanged aliens open a sports hunt for them.
Bringing the iconic 80s character back to the big screen.

Look out for George Clooney, who teamed up with rock photographer-now-director Anton Corbijn ("Control") for a highly curious existential study of the psychology of an aging hitman hiding from people in a small Italian town and delving into human nature.
"The visionary artist of Corbijn's scale and the magnificent George Clooney is a movie union made in heaven," the studio press release boasts.
In addition, this project is another confirmation of the longest love relationship in Clooney's life - with Italy: the shooting took place in the picturesque town of Castel del Monte in Abruzzo.

Taking as a basis the novel by Martin Booth "A Very Secretive Gentleman," Rowan Joffe made some adjustments to his script: the place of the narrator-Englishman was taken by the title American, and the main character turned from an illegal gunsmith into a simple killer.

Otherwise, the story is close to the original: while killer Jack is trying to deal with his last business and finally tie up with a profitable craft, his icy heart melts under the charm of a local priest (Paolo Bonachelli) and a street prostitute (Tekla Ryuten), in whom Clooney's character instantly falls in love.
"Jack tempts fate," reads the official synopsis.
The dangerous messenger of darkness is getting closer and closer to him, and the mysterious lady who hires him may well not be the one he pretends to be."
Judging by the trailer, Corbijn's visual experiments, peppered with Clooney's ash hair (the film is like a long 02 clip), have reached a qualitatively new level.

Меган Фокс уволили из «Трансформеров 3»
Как уверяет кинокомпания Рагатоипе, увольнение «не связано с тем интервью, в котором Фокс сравнила Майкла Бэя с Гитлером».
Тем не менее, место главной героини и новой возлюбленной героя Шайи ЛаБафа скорее всего займет английская модель Рози Хантингтон-Уитли.
У девушки нет никакого опыта в кино, так что ей предстоят ускоренные курсы актерского мастерства.
Этот факт не должен пугать искушенного зрителя - в истории кинематографа есть масса примеров успешной переквалификации моделей в актрис.

Шарлиз Терон («Монстро»), Анджелина Джоли («Прерванная жизнь»), Джессика Лэнг («Голубое небо», «Тутси»), Ким Бэсингер («Секреты Лос-Анджелеса»), Дженнифер Коннели («Игры разума»), Джина Дэвис («Случайный турист») и «Первая вице-мисс США-86» Халле Берри («Бал монстров») начинали как манекенщицы или снимались для модных журналов, в итоге получили заслуженный «Оскар».
Преуспели в актерском мастерстве (также красавицы Милла Йовович, Кэмерон Диас, Моника Белуччи и, что особенно приятно, наша соотечественница Ольга Куриленко.
Высокие награды у них явно на расстоянии вытянутой руки.
Одним словом, у Рози есть, с кого брать пример.

Валерия Гай Германика, заслужившая Особого упоминания каннского жюри в 2008 году за картину «Все умрут, а я останусь» и снявшая скандальный телесериал «Школа», получила должность креативного директора на телеканале МТ.
Руководство канала считает, что именно Валерии удастся принести желаемые и необходимые перемены.
В частности, уже планируются съемки собственного сериала (про подростков или про вампиров).
Также Германика начала кастинг новых ведущих.
Комедия «Колотилов» режиссера Лео Габриадзе и продюсера Тимура Бекмамбетова неожиданно превратилась в «Выкрутасы».

Основная тема фильма осталась прежней — провинциальный учитель русского языка Слава Колотилов (Константин Хабенский) спешит в Москву к невесте, но задерживается, чтобы тренировать футбольную команду беспризорников.
Новое развитие получила вторая сюжетная линия картины.
Вместо актрисы Елены Плаксиной роль столичной невесты Нади исполнит Милла Иовович.
В качестве дополнительной интриги появится третий — бывший жених Нади Даня (Иван Ургант).
Таким образом, помимо вопроса, победит ли дворовая команда в футбольном чемпионате, встает дилемма, кому достанется Милла Йовович.
По причине постоянных отлагательств съемок «Хоббита» и наличия массы сторонних проектов Гильермо дель Торо отказался от позиции режиссера.
Студии уговаривают продюсера Питера Джексона взять дело полностью в свои руки, но он готов согласиться на этот шаг только в случае острой необходимости.
В качестве возможных преемников называются Дэвид Иейтс, закончивший съемки саги о Гарри Поттере, и Нил Бломкамп, чей фильм «Район №9», спродюсированный Джексоном, получил номинацию на «Оскар».
Официально имя нового режиссера будет названо на очередном конвенте Сотс-Соп в конце июля.
Megan Fox has been fired from Transformers 3.
The film company Paramount ensures that the firing "is not related with the interview in which Fox compared Michael Bay to Hitler."
That notwithstanding, the role of the lead female character and new girlfriend of protagonist Shia LeBeouf will likely be taken by English model Rosie Huntington-Whiteley.
The young woman has no experience in film, so she'll have to fast-track some acting master classes.
But that fact shouldn't scare off tempted viewers: film history contains many examples of models successfully changing careers into acting.

Charlize Theron (Monster), Angelina Jolie (Girl, Interrupted), Jessica Lange (Blue Sky, Tootsie), Kim Basinger (L.A. Confidential), Jennifer Connelly (A Beautiful Mind), Geena Davis (The Accidental Tourist), and the first runner-up of Miss USA 1986, Halle Berry (Monster's Ball) all started out as runway models or were photographed for fashion magazines and ended up winning well-earned Oscars.
The beauties Milla Jovovich, Cameron Diaz, Monica Bellucci and, what's especially pleasant, our own Olga Kurylenko, all found success in acting.
For them, the highest awards are clearly just a reach away.
That's all to say, Rosie does have precedents to follow.

Valeriya Gai Germanika, who earned Special Mention from the Cannes jury in 2008 for her film Everybody Dies but Me and who filmed the scandalous TV series School, has been appointed creative director of the channel MTV.
The channel's leadership believes that Valeriya is who they need to bring about necessary and desired changes.
Specifically, plans are already underway for the filming of an in-house series (about teenagers and vampires).
Germanika has also begun auditions for new leads.
The comedy Kolotilov, from director Leo Gabriadze's and produced by Timur Bekmambetov, has suddenly been renamed Lucky Trouble.

The basic subject of the film remains the same: Slava Kolotilov (Konstantin Khabensky), a Russian language teacher from a provincial town, is rushing to Moscow to meet his bride but is delayed when he decides to train a football team of street children.
The film's secondary plot line has been further developed.
In the place of actress Elena Plaksina, the role of the Moscow bride Nadya will be played by Milla Jovovich.
To provide additional intrigue, a third man has been added: Nadya's former groom Danya (Ivan Urgant).
With this, in addition to the question of whether the backyard team will win the football championship, there is also the dilemma of who will get the hand of Milla Jovovich.
Due to his constant obligations on the set of The Hobbit and a pile of other side projects, Guillermo del Toro has declined the role of director.
Studios are trying to convince producer Peter Jackson to take the whole project into his own hands, but he's willing to take that step only if absolutely necessary.

Among those who have been named as possible inheritors are David Yates, who has finished filming the Harry Potter saga, and Neill Blomkamp, whose film District 9, produced by Jackson, was nominated for an Oscar.
The name of the new director will be officially announced at the usual Comic Con convention at the end of July.

Success in acting (also the beauties Milla Yovovich, Cameron Diaz, Monica Belucci and, which is especially pleasant, our compatriot Olga Kurilenko.

Анджелина Джоли сыграет Клеопатру

Очумевшие от жесткого расписания, критики и кинематографисты на сверхскоростях носились меж сочинским Зимним театром, где проходили показы с мастер-классами, и гостиницей «Жемчужина», в которой потоком шли пресс-конференции и круглые столы, едва успевая нырнуть в Черное море.

Под стать вели себя и герои конкурсных фильмов - практически в каждом кто-то куда-то бежал: растерянные азиаты из «Гастарбайтера» Юсупа Разыкова и «Другого неба» Дмитрия Мамулии искали пропавших внука и жену, беглый бандит из картины Юрия Быкова «Жить»
Тех же ментов счастливо обводил вокруг пальца герой детектива Клима Шипенко «Кто я?» — который, впрочем, запомнился публике скорее присутствием в кадре тотально обнаженной Жанны Фриске.

Появились герои отечественного шоу-бизнеса и еще в паре конкурсных картин - в фильме «Слон» Сергей Шнуров сыграл дальнобойщика, везущего цирковое животное на убой, а Евгений Гришковец порассуждал на любимые темы - женское предательство, мужское одиночество, целительная сила алкоголя - в кинопостановке на двоих «Сатисфакция», где бизнес-партнеры вызывали друг друга на алкодуэль из-за дамы.
Впрочем, и деловые мероприятия на «Кинотавре» носили ощутимый отпечаток шоу — не было скучно ни на одном.

На круглом столе, посвященном судьбам российского артхауса, живописную свару с критиками устроил председатель фонда поддержки отечественного кино Сергей Толстиков: «Вы вообще читаете статьи в прессе, которые читаю я?» - грозно вопрошал он у собравшихся.
«Я их пишу», — растерянно отвечал президент ЕРВЕЗС! Андрей Плахов.

На этом скандалы не закончились: ближе к концу фестиваля из конкурсной программы внезапно сняли фильм Алексея Федорченко «Овсянки» - он поедет в Венецию: отборщики Мостры решили, что лишний российский показ им помеха.

Раньше «Кинотавр» гигантам не мешал - в Сочи не раз показывали фильмы больших фестивалей: в этот раз, скажем, в конкурсе участвовал фильм Сергея Лозницы «Счастье мое», весной соревновавшийся с Михалковым и Вирасетакуном на Лазурном берету.
Никита Сергеевич на «Кинотавре» посетил фильм бывшего каннского конкурента и заявил, что тот ему понравился.
Председателю жюри Карену Шахназарову картина Лозницы, напротив, не понравилась вовсе — но под давлением коллег он вынужден был дать ей приз за режиссуру.
Награду за лучший дебют — «Пропавший без вести» — получила дочь
Жуткая киноэнциклопедия русской жизни: наивного гуманного и рационального героя бьют, грабят и провоцируют на чудовищные поступки без всякой видимой цели.
Точно поставленный, очищающий фильм-опыт, снятый мизантропом с математическим образованием, который призывает только к одному - начните мыслить.

Дебютант с философским образованием, Мамулия называет фильмы цитатами из Мамардашвили, избегает любых событий в сценарии и утверждает, что радость зрителя - в труде по постижению его малодоступных медитативных фильмов.
Самая сложная картина «Кинотавра» уже отобрана в конкурс Карловых Вар — режиссерская звезда родилась.
Безупречно одетый и постриженный программист Леонид реагирует на мир со сдержанной брезгливостью, прячась в норе аккуратного холостяцкого быта.
Но на дом опускается чугунная баба, на голову героя — несправедливая рука карательных органов, и он начинает бессмысленный бег по кафкианским пространствам и ситуациям.
«Иногда полезно работать не только с дебютантами», - торжествующе заявила со сцены продюсер Сабина Еремеева, забирая приз.
Критики сочли иначе: по их мнению, Сабине просто удалось вытащить «внутреннего дебютанта» из корифея отечественного арт-кино.
И это симптоматично - нынче в нашем кино зубры движутся за молодежью.
А вовсе не наоборот.
Документальное кино, снятое так, что голову сносит почище, чем от аналогичного художественного.

Автору интересна и отвертка, исследующая электрический счетчик, и кусок несоленого сливочного, дрейфующий по чугунной сковороде, -— все это превращает историю о безработном шахтере, его редкозубой возлюбленной и ее уголовнике-брате в настоящее док-полотно маслом.
Победитель конкурса короткого метра Николай Соколов примеряет черно-белую стилистику французской новой волны на мир спальных районов.

Пусть годаровские монтажные ходы в истории о двух школьниках, один из которых мечтает сделать бомбу, а другой — сыграть Баха задом наперед, выглядят странно, но за редкую попытку поэтизации окружающей реальности — спасибо.

«Три раза в год - накануне Дня Победы, Дня России и Дня города — в небо поднимаются порядка десяти самолетов типа Ан-12, Ил-18, Ан-32, Ан-24, оборудованных на время проведения работ метеорологической аппаратурой и техническими средствами воздействия на облака и нагруженных специальными экологически чистыми химическими веществами — жидким азотом, гранулированной углекислотой (“сухой лед”), метеорологическими пиропатронами с йодистым серебром и порошкообразными реагентами.

Процесс выглядит следующим образом: самолеты на расстоянии 50-100 километров от Москвы (в зависимости от длины и мощности дождевого фронта) “разбивают” этими реагентами тучи, идущие на город. Частицы веществ конденсируют вокруг себя влагу.
В результате осадки выпадают раньше, чем планировалось, и именно в том месте, где произошло воздействие на облако».
Уже лет десять ведется работа над ремейком научно-фантастического фильма, в котором главную роль играл Майкл Иорк.
Недавно режиссером был назначен Карл Ринш (у него в графике уже стоит ремейк «Твари из Черной лагуны»), прославившийся своими рекламными роликами.
Ранее с проектом были связаны имена Брайана Сингера («Люди Икс»), Джеймса МакТига (V значит вендетта») и Джозефа Косински («Трон: Наследие»).
По сюжету герой, которому исполнилось тридцать лет, вынужден бежать от смертного приговора, так как общество будущего казнит всех граждан по достижении этого возраста.
Роберт Родригес приобрел права на ротоскопический фэнтези-мультфильм 80-х и планирует сделать из него масштабное кино.
Оригинал был плодом совместного творчества режиссера Ральфа Бакши (м/ф «Властелин колец», 1976) и фэнтези-художника Фрэнка Фрацетты.
Темой мультфильма были мечи, магия и большое количество нарисованных сисек.
В нем воитель Ларн спасает принцессу Тигру и весь народ от злобного повелителя льдов Некрона.
Родригес обещает внимательно отнестись к созданию нелюдей и варваров на птеродактилях.
Джордж А. Ромеро отправит своих зомби в отпуск на ближайшее время, так как сам 1 планирует заняться ремейком классической джалло-картины Дарио Ардженто.
На широкие экраны героев вернет не кто иной, как Майкл Бэй - властелин экшена, взрывов и хоррор-ремейков.
Angelina Jolie will play the role of Cleopatra

Driven into a frenzy by the unforgiving schedule, critics and filmmakers have been flying at super-speed between Sochi's Winter Theater, where showings with master classes took place, and the Zhemchuzhina hotel, where a constant stream of press releases and round tables have been held. They've hardly had time to take a plunge into the Black Sea.

The protagonists of the competing films behaved similarly: in almost every one, someone was running somewhere — frazzled Asians in Yusup Razykov's Gastarbaiter and Dmitry Mamuliya's Drugogo Neba searched out a lost grandson and wife, and a swift bandit runs around in Yury Bykov's Zhit.

The protagonist of Klim Shipenko's film Kto Ya? wrapped the same cops around his finger — a film which, by the way, was most memorable to the public on account of showing a completely nude Jeanna Friske.

Heroes of Russian show business also appeared in a couple of the competing films: in the film Slon, Sergei Snurov plays a truck driver transporting circus animals to slaughter, and Evgeny Grishkovets contemplated every subject imaginable — cheating women, lonely men, the and therapeutic power of alcohol — in Statisfaction, in which business partners challenge each other to an alco-duel because of a lady.
What is more, TV shows made a palpable impression on the events at Kinotavr — not a single one of them was a bore.

At a round-table dedicated to the fate of Russian art house films, Sergei Tolstikov, the chair of a fund for supporting Russian cinema, got in a beautiful spat with critics: "Do you even read the press articles that I read?" he intimidatingly inquired of those gathered there.
"I write them," Andrey Plakhov, the president of ERVE3S! answered, nonplussed.

But that wasn't the end of the scandals: near the conclusion of the festival, Aleksei Fedorchenko's film Silent Souls was unexpectedly pulled from the program: it's going to Venice, and Mostra's curators decided that an unnecessary Russian showing was not in their interest.

Kinotavr never used to bother the giants: films from the large festivals have been shown in Sochi many times. This time, for example, Sergei Loznitsa's film My Joy participated in the competition. In the spring it competed with Mikhalkov and Weerasethakul on the Côte d'Azur.
At Kinotavr, Nikita Sergeevich attended the film of the former Cannes competitor and stated that he liked it.
On the other hand, jury chair Karen Shakhnazarov didn't like Loznita's film at all — but under the pressure of his peers, he was forced to give it the prize for best director after all.
His daughter received the prize for the best debut, for the film Missing Man.
A terrifying cinematic encyclopedia of Russian life: the naive, humane, and rational protagonist of the film is beaten, robbed, and incited to monstrous acts without any discernible goal.
A precisely presented and refreshing film experience captured by a misanthrope with an education in math, which has one single message: start thinking.

A debutant with an education in philosophy, Mamulia names his films after quotes from Mamardashvili, avoids any and all events in the screenplay, and affirms that the viewer's enjoyment lies in the work it takes to understand his inaccessible, meditative films.
The most difficult film at Kinotavr has already been selected for the competition at Karlovy Vary. A new directorial star has been born.
The impeccably dressed and shorn computer programer Leonid reacts to the world with restrained squeamishness, hiding away in the hole of his well-maintained bachelor lifestyle.
But a headstrong woman descends on his household, the unjust hand of law enforcement comes down on his head, and he begins to run a meaningless gauntlet of Kafkaesque spaces and situations.
"Sometimes it's important to work with people who aren't debutants," the producer Sabina Eremeeva victoriously announced from the stage, collecting her prize.
Critics thought otherwise: in their opinion, Sabina simply succeeded in drawing the "inner debutant" out of one of Russia's art house heveyweights.
And this is more broadly symptomatic: in our cinema today, the masses are following the younger generation.
And not the other way around.
It's a documentary picture filmed in such a way that it takes your head off more cleanly than a feature film cut from the same cloth.

The filmmaker is interested even in a screwdriver probing an electric meter, or a piece of unsalted butter drifting across a cast-iron skillet — and all these details turn this story of an unemployed miner, his gap-toothed lover, and her criminal brother into a visual masterpiece of a documentary.
The winner in the short film category, Nikolai Sokolov, applies the black and white style of the French new wave to the world of bedroom communities.

And sure, Godard-like montages come off strangely in a story about two schoolboys, one of whom dreams of making a bomb and the other of playing Bach compositions backwards — but we can't help but say "thank you" for the rare attempt at poeticizing the reality that surrounds us.

"There are three days a year — on the eve of Victory Day, Russia Day, and City Day — that a fleet of ten An-12, Il-18, An-32, and An-24 planes takes off into the sky. They're equipped for their work with meteorological tools and technical means for affecting clouds, and loaded with specialized ecologically clean chemicals: liquid nitrogen, granulated carbonic acid ("dry ice"), and meteorological pyroshells with silver iodide and powderlike reagents.

The process looks like this: the planes use these reagents to "break up" clouds headed towards the city at a distance of 50–100 kilometers from Moscow (depending on the length and intensity of the rain front). The moisture condenses onto the chemical particles.
As a result, the precipitation falls earlier than it otherwise would and in the specific spot where the clouds were acted upon."
It's already been ten years that work has been ongoing on the remake of the science fiction film that starred Michael York.
Carl Rinsch, famous for his advertising clips, was recently appointed as the director (he's already slated for the Creature from the Black Lagoon remake as well).
Previously, names associated with the project included Bryan Singer (X-Men), James McTeigue (V for Vendetta), and Joseph Kosinski (Tron: Legacy).
In the story, the protagonist, who is about to turn 30, has to flee from a death sentence because the society of the future executes all citizens when they reach that age.
Robert Rodriguez got the rights to the rotoscope-animated 80s fantasy cartoon and plans to turn it into a large-scale film.
The original was the product of collaborative creative work between the director Ralph Bakshi (the animated The Lord of the Rings, 1976) and the fantasy artist Frank Frazetta.
The subject of the cartoon was swords, sorcery, and a lot of illustrated boobs.
In it, the warrior Larn saves Princess Teegra and all the people from the evil master of ice, Nekron.
Rodriguez promises to be attentive when creating the monsters and barbarians riding pterodactyls.
George A. Romero is sending his zombies on vacation for the time being since he himself is planning to take up the remake of Dario Argento's classic Giallo film.
The person returning the characters to the big screen is none other than Michael Bay — the sovereign lord of action films, explosions, and horror remakes.
Angelina Jolie will play Cleopatra.

Driven mad by the gruelling schedule, critics and filmmakers raced at breakneck speed between the Sochi Winter Theatre, where screenings and masterclasses were held, and the "Pearl" hotel, where press conferences and round tables were held in a continuous stream, barely having time to dip into the Black Sea.

The heroes of the competition films also behaved accordingly - in almost every one someone was running somewhere: bewildered Asians from Yusup Razykov's "Gastarbeiter" and Dmitry Mamuliya's "Another Sky" were looking for a missing grandson and wife, a runaway bandit from Yuri Bykov's film "To Live".

The same cops were happily fooled by the hero of Klim Shipenko's detective story "Who am I?" - who, however, was remembered by the audience more for the presence in the frame of a completely naked Zhanna Friske.

However, even the business events at "Kinotavr" had a noticeable imprint of the show - there was never a dull moment.

Previously, the "Kinotavr" did not interfere with the giants - in Sochi, films from major festivals were often shown: this time, for example, the film "My Joy" by Sergei Loznitsa, which competed with Mikhalkov and Weerasethakul on the Côte d'Azur, participated in the competition.

And it's symptomatic - nowadays in our cinema, the old guard follows the youth.

The author is interested in a screwdriver that examines an electric meter, and a piece of unsalted butter floating on a cast-iron pan, all of which turns the story of an unemployed miner, his rare-toothed lover and her criminal brother into a real oil-on-canvas docking station.
Short-meter winner Nikolai Sokolov is trying out the black-and-white French new wave style in the world of sleeping areas.

Although the story of two schoolboys, one of whom dreams of making a bomb and the other of playing Bach backwards, may seem strange, but for a rare attempt to poetize the surrounding reality, thank you.

Three times a year - on the eve of Victory Day, Russia Day and City Day - about ten aircraft of the type An-12, Il-18, An-32, An-24 are raised to the sky, equipped for the time of work with meteorological equipment and technical means of impacting the clouds and loaded with special ecologically clean chemical substances - liquid nitrogen, granulated carbon dioxide (dry ice), meteorological pyropatrons with iodized silver and powdery reagents.
The process is as follows: airplanes at a distance of 50-100 kilometers from Moscow (depending on the length and power of the rain front) "break" with these reagents the clouds that go to the city.
As a result, precipitation falls earlier than planned and exactly where the clouds were impacted.
For ten years, work has been underway on a remake of the sci-fi film starring Michael York.
Recently, Karl Rinsh was appointed director (he already has a remake of "The Creature from the Black Lagoon" in the schedule), who became famous for his advertising clips.
Previously, the project has been associated with the names of Brian Singer (X People), James McTig (V means vendetta) and Joseph Kosinski (Tron: Legacy).
The plot follows a thirty-year-old man who is forced to escape from a death sentence because the society of the future executes all citizens after reaching that age.
Robert Rodriguez has acquired the rights to a rotoscopic fantasy cartoon from the '80s and plans to make it into a major motion picture.
The original was a collaboration between director Ralph Bakshi (m/f The Lord of the Rings, 1976) and fantasy artist Frank Frazetta.
The theme of the cartoon was swords, magic and a large number of painted boobs.
In it, warrior Larn saves Princess Tigre and the entire nation from the evil Ice Lord Nekron.
Rodriguez promises to be careful about creating Inhumans and barbarians on pterodactyls.
George A. Romero is going to be putting his zombies on vacation soon, as he plans to remake Dario Argento's classic Jallo movie.
Bringing the heroes back to the big screen is none other than Michael Bay, master of action, explosion and horror remakes.
Angelina Jolie is going to play Cleopatra.

Stunned by the tight schedule, critics and cinematographers were speeding between the Winter Theater in Sochi, where shows with master classes were held, and the "Pearl Hotel", where there were press conferences and round tables, barely managing to dive into the Black Sea.

The characters of the competing films were also under the article - almost everyone ran somewhere: confused Asians from "Gastharbytera" Yusup Razykova and "Other heaven" Dmitry Mamuliya searched for the missing grandson and wife, the fugitive bandit from Yuri Bykov's painting "To live"

Those same cops were happily surrounded by detective Klim Šipenko's character Who am I? who, however, was remembered by the audience more by the presence in the frame of the totally naked Jeanne Friske.

Heroes of the domestic show business also appeared in a couple of competition pictures - in the film "Slon" Sergei Shnurov played a trucker carrying a circus animal to the slaughter, and Evgeny Hryshkovets spoke on favorite topics - female treachery, male loneliness, the healing power of alcohol - in the two-person film "Satisfaction", where business partners called each other for an alkoduel because of a woman.
However, the business events at "Cinematheque" had a noticeable impact on the show - it was not boring at any of them.

At a round table dedicated to the fate of the Russian arthouse, the chairman of the fund for support of Russian cinema, Sergey Tolstykov, had a painterly quarrel with critics: "Do you read the articles in the press that I read?" - he asked the gathered menacingly.
"I write them", the president of the YERVEZ, Andrey Plakhov, replied confused.

The scandals did not end there: closer to the end of the festival, the film of Alexei Fedorchenko, "Osijanki", was abruptly removed from the competition program - he will go to Venice: the selectors of the Mostra decided that the excessive Russian showing would interfere with them.

Previously, "Kinotavr" did not interfere with the giants - films of big festivals were shown in Sochi many times: this time, for example, Sergei Loznica's film "My Happiness" participated in the competition, which competed with Mikhalkov and Virasetakun on the Azure Beret in the spring.
Nikita Sergeyevich on Kinotavr visited the film of the former Cannes competitor and stated that he liked it.
Chairman of the jury Karen Shahnazarov, on the contrary, did not like the painting Loznitsa, but under pressure from colleagues, he was forced to give it a prize for directing.
The award for best debut Missing went to his daughter.
A horrifying encyclopedia of Russian life: a naive, humane and rational hero is beaten, robbed and provoked into monstrous acts with no apparent purpose.
A well-made, purifying movie experience, directed by a misanthrope with a math education, that only asks you to do one thing -- think.

A debutante with a philosophical education, Mamulya calls the films quotes from Mamaradashivili, avoids any events in the script, and claims that the joy of the viewer is in the effort to comprehend his hard-to-find meditative films.

The flawlessly dressed and shaven programmer Leonid reacts to the world with a restrained cavalier, hiding in the den of a neat bachelor lifestyle.
But the iron woman descends on the house, the unjust hand of the punitive bodies is on the hero's head, and he begins a senseless run through Kafkaesque spaces and situations.
"Sometimes it's useful to work with more than just debutants", producer Sabina Eremeeva stated triumphantly from the stage, taking away the prize.
Critics thought otherwise: in their opinion, Sabine simply managed to pull an "internal debutante" out of the corridor of domestic art-cinema.
